scripts.build: vite build && sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org steven-eubank --project javascript-react ./dist && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org steven-eubank --project javascript-react ./dist
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org steven-eubank --project javascript-react ./dist && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org steven-eubank --project javascript-react ./dist
